name: testing spark partition with column within

content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kjastorage.dfs.core.windows.net/test/partitiontest/Master_Order_spark_partition_with_column/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where 
    [result].filepath(1) = 'Sub_Ord_Create_Dt_Key=20200606'
